text: Bulgaria competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland. The nation returned to the Olympic Games after having missed the 1948 Summer Olympics. 63 competitors, 54 men and 9 women, took part in 34 events in 8 sports. ==Medalists== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport ! Event ! Date |- | || Boris Nikolov || Boxing || Men's Middleweight || 1 August |} ==Athletics== ==Basketball== ===Preliminary round=== ====Group 2==== |} ===Quarterfinals=== The top two teams in each quarterfinals advanced to the semifinals.
